body: This listed French artist is known for his soft realistic watercolors. Bruneau’s work has been sold at such venues as Sloans & Kenyon and Sotheby’s
dimensions: Watercolor, 8 x 11 inches / Signed lower right
metaTitle: Andrien-Louis Bruneau Painting - Mice - 19th Century French Fine Art
